ClassDef.Name: Image3D

Properties.Name: Image
Properties.Description: Specifies the image of the decal.

Properties.Name: TextureScale
Properties.Description: The scale of the texture on the decal.

Properties.Name: TextureOffset
Properties.Description: The offset of the texture on the decal.

Properties.Name: Color
Properties.Description: Determines the color of the decal.

Properties.Name: CastShadows
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the decal should cast shadows.

Properties.Name: Shaded
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the decal should be affected by lighting.

Properties.Name: FaceCamera
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the decal should always face the camera.

ClassDef.Description: Decals are objects that can have an image texture and are placed in the world.
